text: President of Maldives Abdulla Yameen Abdul Gayoom send a message of condolence on the demise of Pandit W D Amaradeva, veteran vocalist, composer and musicion.In a message to President Maithripala Sirisena, he expressed his sorrow over the death of the renowned musicion, vocalist and composer.
title: Maldives President condoles demise of Pandit Amaradeva
